title: On the gluing of formal schemes
authors: R. A. Calixto, T. H. Freitas and V. H. Jorge P\'erez
abstract:
The main focus of this paper is to show that the gluing of formal schemes is
also a formal scheme. The algebraic approach established here also leads us to
conclude when the gluing of $k$-formal schemes is a $k$-formal scheme. In
addition, we derive that the gluing of formal schemes is always singular,
regardless of whether we know the structure of the schemes involved.
